data.eml:eml: Basilia quadrosae sp. nov. (Diptera: Nycteribiidae), member of the ferruginea group, from Southern Brazil.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Graciolli, Gustavo, Moura, Maurício O. (2005): Basilia quadrosae sp. nov. (Diptera: Nycteribiidae), member of the ferruginea group, from Southern Brazil. Zootaxa 1087: 33-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170499
